profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.11 Embedded files - File specification dictionary
profile.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in PDF 3.10.2, shall not contain the EF key
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A file specification dictionary, as defined in PDF 3.10.2, shall not contain the EF key

error.message: A file specification dictionary contains the EF key
